constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 175 (Tuesday, October 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACKSON:
H.R. 5490.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section VIII of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H5601]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: FARM Act
